targets.expr:
avg by (service_name,state) (max_over_time(mongodb_mongod_connections{service_name=~"$service_name", state=~"current|available"}[$interval]) or max_over_time(mongodb_mongod_connections{service_name=~"$service_name", state=~"current|available"}[5m]) or max_over_time(mongodb_mongos_connections{service_name=~"$service_name", state=~"current|available"}[$interval]) or max_over_time(mongodb_mongos_connections{service_name=~"$service_name", state=~"current|available"}[5m]) or 
max_over_time(mongodb_connections{service_name=~"$service_name", state=~"current|available"}[$interval]) or 
max_over_time(mongodb_connections{service_name=~"$service_name", state=~"current|available"}[5m]))

panels.description: Average latency of operations (classified by read, write, or (other) command)
panels.title: $service_name - Latency

panels.description: Ratio of index entries scanned or whole docs scanned / number of documents returned

targets.expr: avg by (service_name) (rate(mongodb_mongod_metrics_query_executor_total{service_name=~"$service_name", state="scanned"}[$interval]) / ignoring(state) rate(mongodb_mongod_metrics_document_total{service_name=~"$service_name", state="returned"}[$interval]) or (irate(mongodb_mongod_metrics_query_executor_total{service_name=~"$service_name", state="scanned"}[5m]) / ignoring(state) irate(mongodb_mongod_metrics_document_total{service_name=~"$service_name", state="returned"}[5m])))

avg by (service_name) (rate(mongodb_mongod_metrics_document_total{service_name=~"$service_name", state="returned"}[$interval]) / ignoring(state)rate(mongodb_mongod_metrics_query_executor_total{service_name=~"$service_name", state="scanned_objects"}[$interval]) or
irate(mongodb_mongod_metrics_document_total{service_name=~"$service_name", state="returned"}[5m]) / ignoring(state)irate(mongodb_mongod_metrics_query_executor_total{service_name=~"$service_name", state="scanned_objects"}[5m]))

panels.title: $service_name - Scan Ratios

targets.expr: sum by (service_name) (mongodb_mongod_metrics_query_executor_total{service_name=~"$service_name", state=~"scanned_objects"}) / ignoring(state)sum by (service_name) (mongodb_mongod_metrics_query_executor_total{service_name=~"$service_name", state=~"scanned_objects|scanned"})

panels.description: Ops/sec (classified by (legacy) wire protocol request type)

targets.expr:
avg by (service_name,type) (rate(mongodb_mongod_op_counters_total{service_name=~"$service_name"}[$interval]) or 
irate(mongodb_mongod_op_counters_total{service_name=~"$service_name"}[5m]) or 
rate(mongodb_mongos_op_counters_total{service_name=~"$service_name"}[$interval]) or 
irate(mongodb_mongos_op_counters_total{service_name=~"$service_name"}[5m]) or 
rate(mongodb_op_counters_total{service_name=~"$service_name"}[$interval]) or 
irate(mongodb_op_counters_total{service_name=~"$service_name"}[5m]))

panels.title: $service_name - Requests

panels.description: Documents inserted/updated/deleted or returned per sec
panels.title: $service_name - Document Operations

panels.description: The number of operations that are currently queued and waiting for a lock
panels.title: $service_name - Queued Operations
